attributes.action: Petition for Jeremy Corbyn to oust the remaining Blairites from the Labour party
attributes.additional_details:
over 200,000 people are in support of Jeremy Corbyn compared to the 170 Right wing Labour back benchers who tried to oust their leader.
Eradicating the right wing MP's from labour will make it a clear battle for No.10 at the next General Election between Left v's Right
attributes.background: Rid the Labour party of the remaining Blairites to make it a clear battle between Left and Right wing politics at the next general election

rejection.details: This is a party political matter, not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
